attributes.action: immediately step down as PM and select Kai Gohegan (Lingfield, Surrey) as his successor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You know its the right thing to do. My first planned acts are as follows:
1. 2 years compulsary service in either Army, Navy, Air Force for School Leavers.
2. Remove Inheritance and Fuel Tax.
3. Before passing any laws or setting any policies, consult with the voters of the UK.
4. Give Scotland its independance if it wants it.
5. Drop income tax to 15% regardless of earnings.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
